column5: Beautiful home in a quiet, cul-de-sac neighborhood; minutes from beaches, shopping, downtown, NAS-CC, and TAMU-CC. Free Wifi, cable, and a well-equipped kitchen. Start your morning with complimentary Keurig coffee, bake with the Breville convection oven, and cook your favorite recipe using All-Clad cookware.   This home is perfect for families and business travelers!
